name: Wild Lion Adventures
description:
Entering a wild savanna is not an easy job. You must have never dreamt of what it would be like to be a real lion? Now you have a unique opportunity to experience the feeling! Using this simulator one can accept the challenge to live like a lion in the savanna full of herbivorous animals like the giraffe, zebra, hippo, elephant, gazelle, buffalo and many more.

Hunting different animals have different scores. As the lion hunts one animal it scores and as it go on hunting many animals one after other in the wild your scores sums up.

Complete a quest to earn lot of coins ! But all in the form of game and game only. These are good games with very good graphics that let you have the thrill without any blood and gore. Moreover there is no real fighting or any bite marks on the prey in these games and thus the players are prevented from exposure to atrocities.

Key features:
- Excellent 3D graphics;
- Lot of animals to fight with;
- Easy controls;
- Upgrades like speed and strength;
- Detailed environment and music ambience;

So, if you want to have pretty fun and enjoy amazing thrill and excitement, there is nothing like this Wild Lion.
